# Building a Shiny App - 4 Steps

1.  Add inputs (UI)
2.  Add outputs (UI/server)
3.  Update Layout (UI)
4.  Update Outputs (server)

```{r}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(gapminder)
```

